column4: I want to get rid of my windows partition, and make everything ubuntu. I have just one fear: Will ubuntu music players be able to 1. Play DRM-locked music (such as music bought from iTunes store) and 2. Sync with my iPod?
why don't you just remove the DRM?
since you're not changing anything on the iPod it will stay the same
Requiem is what I hear is popular to remove the DRM without burning CDs
